text: @senjudiciary @LindseyGrahamSC Let me know when we can sue the GOP Senate & governors. China isn't supposed to do anything for us, but the Senate is. Your COVID-19 focus is led by trump who just pretends it's gone away. It hasn't- certainly not in SC (if Lindsey ever took time from golfing to check it out.)
